title: Mahjong City Tours: Free Mahjong Classic Game

creator: Jam City, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Discover the relaxing game of mahjong classic and explore the world on your very own mahjong journey! Enjoy over 1700 fun layouts in exotic locations around the globe! Play Mahjong free of charge!

If you like a good mahjong game, dominoes game, sudoku, and or a challenging chess game, then you are in the right place! Traditional mahjong is a big part of our exciting new mahjong journey game. Solve challenging mah jong layouts and discover Paris!

This new Mahjong Solitaire game is better than mexican train, more exciting than microsoft mahjong and more colorful then hong kong mahjong. Explore the world's best cities like Paris, London & New York as you tackle challenging mah jongg levels. Power-ups and obstacles provide an unexpected twist to every mah-jong level. And don’t forget to collect your free mahjong rewards.

Highlights:

▶ Enjoy 1700+ fun levels in a fantastic mahjong journey around the globe.
▶ Go on a treasure quest and find over 250 rare souvenirs.
▶ Stunning graphics and original mahjong (麻将) gameplay.
▶ Claim your rewards in the weekly american mahjong tournaments and quests.
▶ Collect beautiful mahjong tiles for endless matching tile adventures.

More highlights:

▶ New goals, power-ups, and obstacles give mahjongg a whole new twist.
▶ Play with others and enjoy your mahjong journey together.
▶ Great fit if you love mahjong solitaire, tripeaks, jigsaw puzzles, mayong, word search and other ‘smart games’.

Discover the relaxing game of mahjong classic and explore the world on your very own mahjong journey! Enjoy over 1700 fun layouts in exotic locations around the globe!

If you like classic mahjong games, puzzle games, dominoes games, sudoku games, classic puzzle games, and or a challenging chess game, then you are in the right place! Traditional mahjong is a big part of our exciting new majongs journey games. Solve challenging majhang layouts and discover the fun puzzle!

This new game is better than mexican majongs train, more exciting than microsoft majongs, and more colorful then hong kong majongs. Explore the world's best cities like Paris, London & New York as you tackle challenging majhang levels. Power-ups and obstacles provide an unexpected twist to every mah-jong level. And don’t forget to collect your free mahjong rewards.

Highlights:

▶ Enjoy 1700+ fun levels in a fantastic classic majongs journey around the globe.
▶ Go on a treasure quest and solve puzzles over 250 rare souvenirs.
▶ Stunning graphics and original majongs (麻将) gameplay.
▶ Claim your rewards in the weekly american classic majhang tournaments and puzzle journey
▶ Collect beautiful classic majongs puzzle tiles for endless matching tile adventures.

More highlights:

▶ New goals, power-ups, free puzzle, and obstacles give mahjongg a whole new twist.
▶ Great fit if you love mahjong solitaire, tripeaks, jigsaw free puzzles, mayong, word search and other ‘smart games’.
▶ Playing with others does not require Facebook Login.
▶ Caring player support and best mah-jong community.

descriptionHtml:
Discover the relaxing game of mahjong classic and explore the world on your very own mahjong journey! Enjoy over 1700 fun layouts in exotic locations around the globe!

If you like classic mahjong games, puzzle games, dominoes games, sudoku games, classic puzzle games, and or a challenging chess game, then you are in the right place! Traditional mahjong is a big part of our exciting new majongs journey games. Solve challenging majhang layouts and discover the fun puzzle!

This new game is better than mexican majongs train, more exciting than microsoft majongs, and more colorful then hong kong majongs. Explore the world's best cities like Paris, London & New York as you tackle challenging majhang levels. Power-ups and obstacles provide an unexpected twist to every mah-jong level. And don’t forget to collect your free mahjong rewards.

Highlights:

▶ Enjoy 1700+ fun levels in a fantastic classic majongs journey around the globe.
▶ Go on a treasure quest and solve puzzles over 250 rare souvenirs.
▶ Stunning graphics and original majongs (麻将) gameplay.
▶ Claim your rewards in the weekly american classic majhang tournaments and puzzle journey
▶ Collect beautiful classic majongs puzzle tiles for endless matching tile adventures.

More highlights:

▶ New goals, power-ups, free puzzle, and obstacles give mahjongg a whole new twist.
▶ Great fit if you love mahjong solitaire, tripeaks, jigsaw free puzzles, mayong, word search and other ‘smart games’.
▶ Playing with others does not require Facebook Login.
▶ Caring player support and best mah-jong community.

descriptionHtml:
🀄 Welcome to Mahjong City Tours - Your Ultimate Mahjong Adventure! 🌟
Embark on a captivating journey through vibrant city streets in Mahjong City Tours! Immerse yourself in the timeless classic game of Mahjong, brought to life with stunning graphics, challenging puzzles, and exciting new features. Whether you're a seasoned player or new to Mahjong games, this game offers an immersive and enjoyable experience.
🎉 Explore the City Pass Feature for an Unforgettable Lunar New Year Celebration! 🏮
Unlock the City Pass and discover a world of possibilities! The Lunar New Year is just around the corner, and Mahjong City Tours is ready to celebrate with you. Engage in festive-themed challenges, special events, and exclusive rewards as you progress through the City Pass.
Key Features:
City Pass Adventure: Uncover the mysteries of the Lunar New Year as you progress through the City Pass. Earn incredible rewards, exclusive tiles, and boosters to enhance your Mahjong skills.
Stunning Graphics: Immerse yourself in the enchanting atmosphere of Mahjong City Tours with visually stunning graphics and beautifully designed tiles. Every move you make is a step closer to revealing the beauty of the city.
Diverse Gameplay: Enjoy a variety of Mahjong puzzles, from classic layouts to unique challenges. With hundreds of levels to explore, you'll always find a new puzzle to solve.
Multiplayer Fun: Compete with friends, family, or players worldwide! Test your skills and climb the global leaderboards for ultimate bragging rights.
Daily Challenges: Keep the excitement going with daily challenges that offer fresh, new puzzles daily. Challenge yourself and earn amazing rewards.
🎁 Special Lunar New Year Events:
Festive Tiles: Collect exclusive Lunar New Year-themed tiles to add a personal touch to your Mahjong journey.
Limited-Time Boosters: Take advantage of special boosters available only during the Lunar New Year celebration. Crush challenging levels with style!
Global Celebrations: Join players from around the world in special events and competitions. Share the joy of the Lunar New Year with the global Mahjong community.
🌐 Connect with the Mahjong Community:
Join our vibrant community on social media to share tips, strategies, and experiences. Connect with fellow players and make new friends who share your passion for Mahjong.
🌟 Download Mahjong City Tours now and embark on a matching game journey of skill, strategy, and celebration! Happy Lunar New Year! 🧧🎊
Includes optional in-game purchases (includes random items).

creator: Jam City, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
🀄 Embark on a Global Mahjong Adventure with Mahjong City Tours! 🌍
Get ready to experience the ultimate Mahjong journey with Mahjong City Tours! Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Mahjong as you explore iconic cities around the globe. With stunning visuals, challenging puzzles, and exciting multiplayer features, Mahjong City Tours offers an unparalleled puzzle game experience for players of all levels.
🏙️ Explore Cities Around the World with the City Pass 🌆
Unlock the City Pass and embark on a thrilling Mahjong adventure through famous cities worldwide! From the vibrant streets of Paris to the bustling markets of Tokyo, each city offers its own unique charm and challenges. Complete challenges to progress through the City Pass and unlock exclusive rewards, collect special tiles, and immerse yourself in the rich culture of each destination.
🗼 Claim the Tower-Top Treasure 🏰
Reach new heights of excitement with the Tower-Top Treasure challenge! Scale towering skyscrapers and conquer each level to claim fantastic rewards. Test your skills, plan your moves, and see if you have what it takes to best the tallest towers in the city!
🔍 Master the Collector's Editor 🎁
Become a true Mahjong collector with the Collector's Editor feature! Hunt for rare and valuable tiles as you explore each city. Complete collections, unlock special rewards, and showcase your expertise as you build your ultimate Mahjong collection. With each game you complete, the thrill of discovery awaits!
🌟 Key Features:
Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in breathtaking graphics and beautifully crafted tile designs that bring each city to life.
Diverse Game Challenges: From classic layouts to unique puzzles, Mahjong City Tours offers over 6,000 levels to keep you entertained for hours.
Global Competition: Compete with players worldwide in real-time online multiplayer board games. Test your skills in online puzzles, and climb the global leaderboards to become a Mahjong master.
Regular Game Updates: Stay engaged with frequent updates, new cities, and exciting events that keep the adventure fresh and thrilling.
Community Engagement: Connect with fellow players online, share tips, and participate in special events via social media channels. Join a vibrant community of Mahjong enthusiasts and make new friends along the way!
🌐 Download Mahjong City Tours now and embark on a matching game journey of discovery, strategy, and excitement! Explore the world, conquer challenges, and become a true Mahjong Games master! 🀄🏙️
